samples.name: Login Form backed by Kinvey
samples.description: This sample login functionality is backed by Kinvey. Follows some of the best practices including: field labels, show password, inline errors, etc. This implementation is also tablet friendly.

samples.name: Carousel Sample Implementation
samples.description: A sample carousel implementation in NativeScript without relying on plugins, built with ui builder and animations.

samples.name: Storing and Retrieving Local Data
samples.description: You can store and retrieve data in your app using the application-settings module. This demo shows you the various application-settings APIs.

samples.name: Detecting Online/Offline Connectivity
samples.description: You can easily monitor the network status of a device using NativeScript's connectivity module.

samples.name: Displaying a Basic Chart with RadChart
samples.description: Use NativeScript UI's RadChart component to display data creatively in your apps. There are various chart types to choose from. This demo shows a bar chart.

samples.name: Displaying a Basic Gauge with a RadGauge
samples.description: Use NativeScript UI's RadGauge to show progress of a task or any circular UI/UX experience that involves gauges.

samples.name: Creating a Modal Page
samples.description: Modal pages are perfect when you want the user to select something without leaving the current page. Or even show a small form.

samples.name: Creating Circular Progress Bars
samples.description: Linear progress bars are boring! How about we use some circular ones?

samples.name: Creating Card UIs
samples.description: Use cards in your app to build attractive UI. Keep it minimal and simple.

samples.name: Building ListViews with Avatars/Thumbnails
samples.description: Often times you need the list UI in your app to have an image for each item. Here's an easy way to do that.

samples.name: Building a Good-Looking Login Form
samples.description: A good looking login/registration experience is a must have for any app. Here is a simple yet elegant looking login form example.

samples.name: Basic Usage of RadCalendar
samples.description: RadCalendar from NativeScript UI has all the features you need to show calendar, range date picking, showing events, and more.

samples.name: Adding Video to Your App
samples.description: NativeScript-Video makes it easy, just drop a Video tag, with a src attribute and boom, you've got video!

samples.name: Working with Audio Files
samples.description: Need to play an audio file (e.g. mp3) in your app? Look no further than this audio sample app.

samples.name: Filterable ListView with Images
samples.description: Actively filter a listview with text entered in a Search Bar.

samples.name: Basic ListView with Images
samples.description: Multi-column listview with images and text overlay.

samples.name: Image ListView with Text Overlay
samples.description: Highly styled image-focused listview with text overlapping items.

samples.name: ListView with Card UI
samples.description: A listview with card-based UI items that are variable sizes.

samples.name: News Feed with Images and Text Items
samples.description: An easy way to display a news feed with an option to filter stories as well.

samples.name: Master/Detail with SideDrawer and Image Background
samples.description: A master/detail UI that uses a SideDrawer as the master list with a styled view (with image background) as the child item.

samples.name: Drawer with Item Highlight
samples.description: A basic styled drawer with a highlighted item and an image background in the header.

samples.name: Drawer with Avatar
samples.description: A basic styled drawer with an avatar image.

samples.name: Simple Styled Login Form
samples.description: A basic UI-only view to inspire styled login form ideas.

samples.name: Building Custom Modal Dialogs
samples.description: You can easily create modal dialogs that contain custom UI.

samples.name: ListView and Details Page with Animating Header
samples.description: You can easily create Master/Detail UI with nice animations and transitions.

samples.name: Master/Detail using Kinvey, Offline, and Image Picker
samples.description: Example construction site inspection app with friendly UX working offline using Kinvey.

samples.name: Upload Image to HTTP Service with Progress Info
samples.description: A sample utilizing nativescript-imagepicker and nativescript-background-http plugins

samples.name: Adding Dialogs to Your App
samples.description: Dialogs help you to give quick feedback to the user about something. Or prompt the user to enter something, or to choose between multiple options.

samples.name: Implementing Phone- and Tablet-specific Styling
samples.description: Learn how to alter your user interface based on phone and tablet form factors.

samples.name: Implementing Split-View Components
samples.description: For when you want a two-column layout on tablets, but a one-column layout on phones.

samples.name: Using Multiple ListView Templates
samples.description: Have a list of different types of items? You can easily define different templates based on conditions, and the ListView will choose the right one.

samples.name: Using RadAutoCompleteTextView
samples.description: Do you expect users to input things from a list? The RadAutoCompleteTextView is a UI element that makes this easy.

samples.name: Configuring Page Transitions
samples.description: Add sleek-looking transition animations when navigating between pages. There are many predefined animations to choose from.

samples.name: Creating Float-Up Text Labels
samples.description: Provide simple but effective label animations for when users focus on individual form elements.

samples.name: Adding Basic Gestures to Your Apps
samples.description: A simple demonstration of how to bind to user interface components to common gestures in your NativeScript apps.

samples.name: Implementing a Parallax Scroll Effect
samples.description: Provide an engaging parallax effect to your views with a simple animation.

samples.name: Basic Usage of RadSideDrawer
samples.description: Do you have lots of menu items? Don't you worry, the RadSideDrawer has got your back. It's very simple to add a Drawer to your application.

samples.name: Using the Camera to Take a Picture
samples.description: Need to take a picture and save it to the device? Look no further.

samples.name: Composing an Email Message
samples.description: If you need the ability to automatically or manually compose an email from your app and let the user use their mail client of choice to send it, check out this sample.

samples.name: Getting a User's Current Location
samples.description: Need to get the geocoordinates or address of the user? NativeScript-Geolocation makes that a breeze.

samples.name: iOS NavigationBar with Large Title
samples.description: iOS has recently introduced the concept of a large navigation bar title when the user needs to provide extra emphasis on context. This is a simple workaround that emulates this behavior.

samples.name: A functional clock built with Absolute Layout
samples.description: This sample shows how easily we can build a clock with the power of Absolute Layout and just a few lines of code.

samples.name: Internet connection status bar
samples.description: Want to notify user if the device is offline? Display Internet connection status bar

samples.name: A custom Floating Action Button with eye-candy transitions.
samples.description: This sample shows how to use the power of NS Layouts and CSS to build a material design based components for either iOS or Android.

samples.name: A simple and easy-to-use dialog
samples.description: This sample shows how to build a simple dialog that you can style and drop into any page.

samples.name: Animated Tab Bar
samples.description: This sample shows how easily we can build a tab bar with sliding animations

samples.name: Groceries app using SQLite
samples.description: This sample shows how to build a fully functional offline task-tracking app (groceries) using a sqlite database.

samples.name: Bottom Navigation Bar for Android
samples.description: A fully-functional bottom navigation bar for Android using NativeScript components.

samples.description: VOD (Video On Demand) app, with nice animations and a login screen.

samples.description: An app design for an engaging music player app.
